verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> in many <S%G4183>things<s%> we <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G4417>stumble<s%>. <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4417>stumbleth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> is a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5468>bridle<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

Now <S%G2400><s%> if we <S%G906>put<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%>' <S%G5469>bridles<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G4314>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> we turn <S%G3329>about<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> body <S%G4983>also<s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the <S%G4143>ships<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G5607>though<s%> they are so <S%G5082>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1643>driven<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G4642>rough<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%>, are yet turned <S%G3329>about<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> a very <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G4079>rudder<s%>, whither3699, Leviticus2 the <S%G3730>impulse<s%> of the <S%G2116>steersman<s%> <S%G1014>willeth<s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3196>member<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> boasteth great <S%G3166>things<s%>. <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, how <S%G2245>much<s%> <S%G5208>wood<s%> is <S%G381>kindled<s%> by how <S%G3641>small<s%> a <S%G4442>fire<s%>!

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> a <S%G4442>fire<s%>: the <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> members3196, 3779 <S%G2525>is<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%>, which <S%G4695>defileth<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> setteth on <S%G5394>fire<s%> the <S%G5164>wheel<s%> of <S%G1078>nature<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is set on <S%G5394>fire<s%> by <S%G1067>hell<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5449>kind<s%> of <S%G5037>beasts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>birds<s%>, <S%G5037><s%> of creeping <S%G2062>things<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> things in the <S%G1724>sea<s%>, is <S%G1150>tamed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath been <S%G1150>tamed<s%> by <S%G5449>mankind<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1150>tame<s%>; it is a <S%G183>restless<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, it is <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G2287>deadly<s%> <S%G2447>poison<s%>.

Therewith1722, 846 bless <S%G2127>we<s%> the <S%G2316>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> therewith1722, 846 curse <S%G2672>we<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3669>likeness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1990>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>? let him <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> his <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G391>life<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4240>meekness<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a wisdom that cometh <S%G2718>down<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G1919>earthly<s%>, <S%G5591>sensual<s%>, <S%G1141>devilish<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> that <S%G2076>is<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> is first4412, Ezekiel3 <S%G53>pure<s%>, <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1516>peaceable<s%>, <S%G1933>gentle<s%>, easy to be <S%G2138>entreated<s%>, <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%>, without <S%G87>variance<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G505>hypocrisy<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> for <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>.
